description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Top Down Cooperative 3D Shooter for 1-4 Local Players. Featuring realistic line of sight and challenging Ai, it gives you a good mix of tactics and hectic shooting. The game includes 5 maps with good replay value, 12 unique enemies, 6 weapons and 4 difficulties. Did I mention the virtually unlimited bullet holes feature?
